Package org.resthub.oauth2.common.front.model

Class org.resthub.oauth2.common.front.model.ObtainTokenErrorResponse extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: -9179219304746945409L

Serialized Fields

error

java.lang.String error
A single error code.

description

java.lang.String description
A human-readable text providing additional information, used to assist in the understanding and resolution of the error occurred.

detailsUri

java.lang.String detailsUri
A URI identifying a human-readable web page with information about the error, used to provide the end-user with additional information about the error.

Class org.resthub.oauth2.common.front.model.ObtainTokenParameter extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 7530540767006126301L

Serialized Fields

grant

java.lang.String grant
Access grant type. For now, only "password" supported.

clientId

java.lang.String clientId
Client identifier. Not used now, must be null.

clientSecret

java.lang.String clientSecret
Client secret. Not used now, must be null.

scope

java.lang.String scope
Space separated list of object that will be accessed. For now, must be empty..

userName

java.lang.String userName
End-user name.

password

java.lang.String password
End-user password.

Class org.resthub.oauth2.common.front.model.TokenResponse extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

serialVersionUID: 3734476795524671722L

Serialized Fields

accessToken

java.lang.String accessToken
The access token issued by the authorization server.

expiresIn

java.lang.Integer expiresIn
The duration in seconds of the access token lifetime.

refreshToken

java.lang.String refreshToken
The refresh token used to obtain new access tokens using the same end-user access grant.

scope

java.lang.String scope
The scope of the access token as a list of space-delimited strings. The value of the "scope" parameter is defined by the authorization server. If the value contains multiple space-delimited strings, their order does not matter, and each string adds an additional access range to the requested scope.

The token life time, in seconds. 15 minutes by default

refreshToken

java.lang.String refreshToken
Corresponding refresh token.

permissions

java.util.List<E> permissions
